purpose: Installs Blightmud, a terminal-based MUD client.
notes: This module installs Blightmud, a modern terminal-based client for Multi-User Dungeons (MUDs), which are text-based online role-playing games. It is a simple package addition with no additional configuration. Reasoning: Provides access to the MUD gaming community for users interested in classic text-based adventures and social gaming experiences.
